body: this was licensed by fakku, onl thay have translations

@justarandomdude24 There's only so many translators/ editors, and usually they're commissioned to translate stuff, or only do the popular works. I honestly feel like taking up Japanese to be able to translate hentai and visual novels myself.
I always ask this why do great artist don't have any translations? On the other hand im willing to wait as long as it takes.
